data.title: hannibal (tv series) : television
data.meta_description: pop culture landmarks and locations from movies, music, television, literature, comic books, video games & more
data.text:
A short distance away from the exterior used for the hospital is the telescope that has been featured in the show Hannibal.

view full location details...

Although Will Graham and company are held in the Baltimore Psychiatric Hospital in the tv series Hannibal, the exteriors used for the show are the David Dunlop Observatory outside of Toronto in Richmond Hill, ON (with a fair amount of CGI added for effect).

Many interiors of the hospital are shot in the facility as well, demonstrating the beaux arts architecture.

view full location details...

Although the Hannibal TV series on NBC is based in Baltimore, Maryland, many of the exteriors for the show were shot in Toronto.

Hannibal Lector's charming 3-story house is actually part of St. Andrew's Church, located across from Roy Thomson Hall on Simcoe St.

view full location details...
